title: Motilal Oswal Recommends Buying This Finance Stock For 20% Upside - Goodreturns
content: Motilal Oswal Recommends Buying This Finance Stock For 20% Upside  Goodreturns
description: The brokerage firm Motilal Oswal recently recommended buying the stocks of LIC Housing Finance (LICHF) for 20% upside. About the stock, the firm mentioned, Demand for Individual Home loans will remain robust in the medium term. This will feed into better disbursements in the Wholesale segment as well.
